===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# Chinese classic medicinal prescriptions or preparations that have been used in [[traditional Chinese medicine]] for hundreds or thousands of years. Prescriptions consist of formulas of medicinal materials ({{zh-l|藥材}}) such as herbs, minerals or other materials.
